name: Channeling Force

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Ability to cast at least one force spell, channel energy class feature.

sections.text: As a swift action, you can expend one use of channel energy to grant your weapon attacks a bonus on damage rolls equal to the number of dice of your channel energy. This extra damage is force damage. This benefit lasts for your next three weapon attacks or until the end of the combat encounter, whichever comes first.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: Ability to cast at least one force spell
description: You distill your channeled energy into a sheen of force that surrounds your weapon for a limited time.
